name: Moebius Bird
description:
Controls: Mouse left-click to fly-up

*Leaderboard will prune duplicate names unfortunately

This game was inspired by the artist Moebius and the game Flappy Bird, with the goal being becoming more comfortable with programming and the Unity Engine. In total, this project took around 200 hours. 

Thank you for playing!

Credits:
Art, Music, and Programming - @UbemStudio
Additional Art - @Lichbrush
